Question
========

Two *random samples* are drawn from a population, one with size 60 and one with size 540. Compared to the sample of 60 observations, the *standard error* of the mean in the sample of 540 observations

Answerlist
----------

* Nine times as small.
* Three times as small.
* About the same size.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nine times smaller...: Incorrect
* Three times as small...: Correct
* About the same size...: Incorrect
